name: Dicey Towers (itch)
description:
For the theme "roll of the dice", this is a game about... well, a rolling dice. A dice tower is an easy tool to drop the dice in and get a result when it rolls out of the bottom, but what happens within such a tower? What perilous obstacles does a die have to overcome on it's journey from top to bottom?

Made by - Lancelot1106

Controls:

W &D or <- & -> for left and right, Spacebar for jump, R for resetting the level (costs a life)

The camera movement will be jittery at times, tried about 5 different things and it wouldn't stop shaking...

Credit where credit's due:

Character controller - Shinjingi
